Saturday, February 05, 2011

Big Games - Headrush

Big Games - Headrush from Paul May on Vimeo. A game for 4-52 people, created in 20 minutes for the Big Games class at ITP. Take a card, stick it on your head and organise into suits without talking or (obvious) gesturing. A lot of fun :)

We're only two weeks into this class; it's already a lot of fun; games are a really pure form of interaction design. We're encouraged to start with something simple, playtest it, improve it, iterate. All good.

Paul May is a researcher and designer from Dublin, living and working in New York. Find out more about Paul's work or get in touch.
